name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior AI Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing scalable AI/ML solutions and financial platforms. Proficient in leveraging **Python** (including **LangChain**, **TensorFlow**, **PyTorch**) and cloud services such as **AWS** and **GCP** to build high-performance systems and enhance MLOps capabilities. Expertise in creating automated data pipelines with **Airflow**, implementing ETL/ELT processes, and utilizing **Kafka** for real-time data integration. Strong background in model monitoring and drift detection ensures the reliability of machine learning workflows. Proven ability to lead projects at top-tier organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, complemented by a commitment to mentoring and effective communication.
